name: Simple Platformer (jynus)
description:
Demo of a generic platformer in black and white- reach to the exit by jumping, while avoiding the spikes/void  and jump with precision on moving platforms.

This was created in a day to serve as a demo/learning exercise for people learning the engine.

Controls- W/D (or arrows) for left and right, Space or Enter to jump, W or UP arrow to exit door
